Verses: 1 karththar Raajarigampannugiraar, Janangal Thaththalippaargalaaga; Avar Kerubeengalin Maththiyil Veetrirukkiraar, Boomi Asaivadhaaga.
2 karththar Seeyonil Periyavar, Avar Ellaa Janangalmelum Uyarndhavar.
3 magaththuvamum Bayangaramumaana Umadhu Naamaththai Avargal Thudhippaargalaaga; Adhu Parisuththamulladhu.
4 raajaavin Vallamai Needhiyil Piriyappadugiradhu, Dhevareer Niyaayaththai Nilainiruththugireer; Neer Yaakkobil Niyaayamum Needhiyum Seygireer.
5 nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Uyarththi, Avar Paadhapadiyile Paniyungal; Avar Parisuththamullavar.
6 avarudaiya Aasaariyaril Moseyum Aaronum, Avar Naamaththaippatrik Kooppidugiravargalil Saamuvelum, Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittaargal; Avar Avargalukku Maru Uththaravu Arulinaar.
7 megasthambaththilirundhu Avargalode Pesinaar; Avargal Avarudaiya Saatchippiramaanangalaiyum Avar Thangalukkuk Koduththa Kattalaiyaiyum Kaikkondaargal.
8 engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Avargalukku Uththaravu Arulineer; Neer Avargal Kiriyaigalinimiththam Needhi Sarikkattinapodhilum, Avargalukku Mannikkira Dhevanaayirundheer.
9 nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Uyarththi, Avarudaiya Parisuththa Parvadhaththirku Neraagap Paniyungal; Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Parisuththamullavar.
